data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Mardan to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mardan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 357,700 lost in Mardan that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary: On average, 88 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Mardan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Mardan, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Mardan prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Kalal (Muslim traditions) people.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Mardan to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Mardan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 354,113 who are far from you in Mardan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Mardan
location.people_groups_list: Turkmen, Bodla, Uzbek, Northern, Pashtun, Northern, Banjara (Muslim traditions)
